text: ara yara amadera ayatasamuhe imana ane, tara yakhana apanara kache ase takhana taderake apani baluna, ‘tomadera prati santi barsita hoka’, tomadera raba tamra nijera upara daya likhe niyechena [1]. Tomadera madhye ke'u ajnatabasata [2] yadi kharapa kaja kare, tarapara ta'oba kare ebam sansodhana kare, tabe niscaya tini (allah‌) ksamasila,parama dayalu
